metadata.synopsis: Dialogue and a sex scene with Haarlep, an incubus that Raphael has fun with.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Talk to or get into the spot area close to incubusteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_IncubusTrigger

23.text: A lost little mouse is running through the House.

17.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Incubus is scantily clad, looking exactly like Raphael lying on the bed in an expectant, almost beckoning position. Later we will  reveal he's just an incubus

169.speaker: Karlach
169.text: Oh gods. What the fuck have I stumbled into.

57.text: A thief in the night, greedy and here to take.

52.text: Why are you here, little thief?

68.text: Raphael? Ha! No. You will have a far crueller master than Raphael, soon. But what inspired you to pay him a visit?

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I seek the Orphic Hammer. You can't stop me.

1.text: Hmmm... Raphael all but spent himself to get that Hammer. And you want to take it off him?

85.text: This is very naughty. Whatever are we to do?
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lounging and languid over the bed, power entirely in their court.

67.text: Why don't we play a game? You win, I give you everything you desire. But you'll enjoy yourself more if you lose...

158.text: Good, little thief, good. Keep going like this, and you'll get to live.
158.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cut to the Incubus eyeing the party lustily, when back, party is in their underwear.

140.text: You'll be crying out my name soon, you'd better know it. I am Haarlep, Raphael's personal incubus, glamoured and transfigured to look like him.

75.text: I'm a perfect copy. He only ever wants to sleep with himself. What's better than the devil you know, eh?

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *His violating stare sees more than all of you. It sees potential.*

78.text: Before we continue, I want to make sure you're comfortable.

99.speaker: Haarlep
99.text: Sometimes, when he's feeling adventurous, Raphael will ask me to change into the 'Archduchess Raphael'.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Temporarily shows you the fem version of the incubus, as an invitation.InternalNodeContext: We are placing succubus dummy here with another voice and body

180.speaker: Haarlep
180.text: I can take her form, if you choose. A simple swap pales in comparison to what you are about to do for me.
180.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still fem RaphaelInternalNodeContext: We are placing succubus dummy here with another voice and body

154.speaker: Narrator
154.text: *It suddenly dawns on you: This creature is of the Hells. They could touch without being harmed, if you want them to.*

28.speaker: Player
28.text: I'll admit. I have dreamed of lying with Raphael. Undiluted and raw.

26.speaker: Karlach
26.context: NodeContext: Disgusted. Player said they've thought of Raphael romantically.

60.speaker: Haarlep
60.text: Oh? Have you? You know, you need not run away should you win. You can stay here if you wish.

134.text: Very well, I will be Raphael himself. All of him.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Transforms into male Raphael form

110.context: InternalNodeContext: Starting with this node, every Speaker 1 answer can be told by either Incubus or Succubus. The proper speaker will be assigned to this speaker slot

105.speaker: Lae'zel
105.text: Do what you want. Don't expect me to applaud you when it's over.
105.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

184.speaker: Shadowheart
184.text: Careful. I doubt Raphael's associates dispense pleasures of the flesh out of charity. There's bound to be a catch.
184.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

15.context: CinematicNodeContext: As soon as the player lies back on the bed, the Incubus looms over them from the foot of the bed

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Any thought of resistance or control is fading. You will obey, giving yourself body and mind to them.*

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Let Haarlep do as they please.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Resist their charms, and hold onto your free will.

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *It's hopeless. Their hold on you is as warm as a blush, and as tight as a manacle.*

165.text: Don't worry about a thing - you are right where you need to be.

133.text: You will make a pretty feast.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *You retain a trace of free will, but it is one drop in the ocean of their desire. It will not last.*

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *Every kiss is as tender as a last goodbye. Every touch a lie of true love.*
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] They come sit on top of you, very suggestive and then bend over to kiss you.

143.speaker: Narrator
143.text: *It is every sensation of a lifetime of love, all at once. Your body trembles with impossible expectation. Unable to resist, a voiceless scream erupts from your mouth: 'Haarlep...'*

106.text: Hmmmm... you are so, so delicious.
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] *He slowly lowers himself, clawed finger scratching your body.*

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *The moment she joins with you, your mind folds over double.*
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the player's impossibly pleasured face

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *As she continues to lavish herself upon your helpless form, you stop breathing, your heart stops beating, and your mind begins to clear entirely.*
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The incubus/succubus rythmically starts moving up and down.  The world around starts to dim, until the player's naked body becomes the only thing left they can perceive, slowly going up and down on the rythm. Representation of them losing their mind.

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *Some last thought whispers in your skull, vacated by everything else but rapture -*
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Everything is dark, player can see their naked body, but they feel like they're in an abyss.

89.text: Devote yourself to pleasure eternal. Stay here with me - this can be forever.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close up on the Incubus' grinning lips

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You can have my body, but not my mind.

70.text: Vow that your body belongs to me.

135.text: Give yourself to me, and I will tell you what you wish to know.

69.text: As with Raphael's, I shall add your body to my glamour. I will gain great pleasure from you, as you.

124.text: But you must vow it - you are mine.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I vow: my body is now yours.

131.speaker: Narrator
131.text: *As she kisses you deeply, it feels as familiar as breathing.*

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *A last cascade of pleasure washes over you, greater than the feelings before, but it draws you back into reality.*
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the player returns to full vision of the House of Hope, and the bed they were on, they see the Incubus now has their identical form, and has turned into them.

71.text: I can't wait to explore how you work. What gets you going. What makes you sweat.

43.text: And every time I make love in your shape, you will know. A shiver out of the blue, a tingle from beyond. You will know.

159.text: Now, your reward for giving me such a present. I will tell you one and only one of Raphael's dirty secrets.

87.text: Whisper it to me - what do you want to know?

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I want to know Raphael's secrets - can you share any?

22.speaker: Player
22.text: How can I find the Hammer?

103.text: Raphael hides nothing from me, can deny me nothing... aside from what he keeps in his safe.

148.text: The safe lingers behind the right-hand painting of Raphael. He almost spends more time staring at those portraits than he does at me.

174.text: Although I'd love to watch you struggle to open the safe without it, this key should help. You've laboured enough, pet.
174.context: CinematicNodeContext: Haarlep gives the key, make gesture but hide detail off camera.

63.text: Now, shall we bid one another goodbye?
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Gets up off the bed.

96.text: Thank you. For you. I will misuse you well.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Incubus turns into you, one more time, waves goodbye. He should disappear after this scene is done.

176.text: I did have a key to give you, but it seems a groping paw has taken it off me. If you slipped it away during our romp, I admire your flexibility.

125.speaker: Player
125.text: The contract I made: how can I retrieve it?

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Is Raphael actually any good in bed?

31.text: But you didn't come all this way to ask that, did you? You wouldn't sell yourself so cheaply, I hope.

91.text: A treasure like you deserves to wrap their hands around Raphael's mightiest rod. The Orphic Hammer.

156.text: I sensed the soul within you chained to the to the contract. You do not deserve to call such a man 'Master'.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: My body belongs to no one but me. Never again.

54.text: Then, this will have been the very last time you experienced pleasure. Time for the BIG death.

178.speaker: Player
178.text: Pleasuring thousands with my body? I'd rather die.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: My heart and soul are yours.

164.text: Indeed they are, and soon they will be gone.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: Distant gigling can still be heard.

177.text: Once I've eaten your heart, you as you know yourself will be gone.

116.text: Your body will live and breathe, left alive as a loving doll to obey the wishes of me and my master.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Soul leaving the overwhelmed avatar

18.text: You will love every beast in the Hells, under my command. What a brilliant future awaits you!

149.speaker: Narrator
149.text: *As the incubus laps up every part of your soul, your mind is lost... once and for all.*

120.speaker: Player
120.text: I already lived an eternity devoted to pleasure, and it was rather dull.

37.text: What? You can resist me? No man has resisted me before...

155.speaker: Player
155.text: Try to cool your desires, and push the creature away.

170.text: Urgh, you are no fun at all.
170.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cuts back to grounded reality, player back on the bed

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *Try as you will, every part of you craves to melt right into him.*

84.speaker: Narrator
84.text: *Every kiss is as tender as a last goodbye. Every touch a lie of true love.*
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] They come sit on top of you, very suggestive and then bend over to kiss you.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: You can have my body, but not my mind.

111.speaker: Narrator
111.text: *You force your eyes open, drawing yourself back to reality... or so you think.*
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the player returns to full vision of the House of Hope, and the bed they were on, they see the Incubus now has their identical form, and has turned into them.

141.speaker: Player
141.text: My heart and soul are yours.

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *As the incubus laps up every part of your soul, your mind is lost... once and for all.*

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Pretend to be helpless, while preparing to fight back.

163.speaker: Player
163.text: Gods, get me out of here!

40.speaker: Astarion
40.text: Darling, what are you doing? This isn't safe - you can't trust him!
40.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

151.speaker: Wyll
151.text: Not to sound like a second-rate writer, but - are you sure this is a good idea?
151.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

157.speaker: Gale
157.text: I'm telling you, this is a mistake.
157.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

171.speaker: Karlach
171.text: I really don't understand you sometimes.
171.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

132.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
132.text: This is an incubus. It will steal your soul. You may need it later.
132.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul. Minthara acts annoyed

108.speaker: Halsin
108.text: I would urge some caution. This honey pot is full of bees.
108.context: NodeContext: Your partner is about to sleep with an incubus and possibly lose their soul

93.speaker: Player
93.text: What is going to happen to me?

33.text: I already told you. It's a surprise. Don't you like surprises?

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Stay as a man, if you please.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: The feminine form is more to my taste.

129.speaker: Haarlep
129.text: Then the Archduchess I shall be.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: I've had enough of your sick game, demon!

49.speaker: Haarlep
49.text: An impotent finale for an impotent show.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I'm not going to play with you.

160.text: There is one way to leave here alive, darling. Play with me? Pretty please? I'd hate to have to kill you.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: It was an accident - a botched teleportation.

173.text: Do not lie. Try again. But this is your last chance.

138.text: Hmm, I'm not sure you are exactly my type.

62.text: Tonight, I wish to reduce the leader of your pack right down to a mewling cub. I like a challenge.
